description: Ministry of Water Supply & Drainage - Acquisition of lands - Parana Alupotha, Badalkumbura D/S Division, Monderagala District for the construction of pump-house under the Badalkumbura water supply scheme - Pussallawa, Badalkumbura D/S Division, Moneragala district for the construction of a storage Tank under the Nakkala Water Supply Scheme - Kanchathilaw, Kanchithalaw D/S Division, Mannar District for the construction of Bore-holes under the Mannar Water supply scheme
